data.actual_result: It's really faded. Quite hard to read.
data.expected_result: Those two things should be in black font.
data.short_description: Role settings and the role name in role editing screen is super faded on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - First, get on light theme. - Go to a server you have "Manage Roles" permission. - Server settings > Roles. - Choose any roles. - Look at the top, where it says "Role settings" and the role name.
